title: [Self-Directed] 2D Animation-Based Mastery of Corporate Law Contract Elements

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Legal Terminology and Contractual Concepts
context.additional_context: Non-degree online program for professionals (medical/legal/technical). Self-paced modular learning via LMS in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners explain the five essential elements of a valid contract (offer, acceptance, consideration, intention to create legal relations, object) with ≥80% accuracy
Learners analyze real case law to identify three grounds for contract invalidity and apply them with ≥75% accuracy
Learners demonstrate practical application skills with a completion rate of over 90% in contract review simulations utilizing animated content
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
